attributes.action: Take disciplinary action against Iain Duncan Smith for lying about his education
attributes.additional_details:
Iain Duncan Smith has lied about his education history to further his career http://www.bbc.co.uk/pressoffice/pressreleases/stories/2002/12_december/19/newsnight_ids_cv.shtml

For the majority of people, being found to have lied about your education or qualifications is grounds for dismissal from employment. I believe that the Conservative party should lead by example and take appropriate disciplinary action against Iain Duncan Smith and show how Lord Beecroft's plans to make it easier to sack people actually work.
